The claim was debunked by the expert: who stated that Queen Elizabeth II did not make any political statements about Muslim refugees or agree with Donald Trump on immigration policy.
The website that published the claim: chicagosuntimes.live, is not the official website of the Chicago Sun-Times, and the story provided no evidence or video to support its headline.
The expert highlighted that Queen Elizab: as the head of state, must remain strictly neutral in political matters, and the ability to make and pass legislation rests with Parliament.
